verses.verse: <S%H3588>"If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1589>steals<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> and <S%H2873>slaughters<s%> it <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4376>sells<s%> it, he shall <S%H9608>pay<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> for the <S%H7794>ox<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> for the <S%H7716>sheep.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> the <S%H1590>thief<s%> is <S%H4672>caught<s%> while <S%H4290>breaking<s%> in, and is <S%H5221>struck<s%> so that he <S%H4191>dies,<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> will be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness<s%> on his account.

"[But] <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> has <S%H2224>risen<s%> on him, there will be <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness<s%> on his account. He shall <S%H9608>surely<s%> <S%H9608>make<s%> <S%H9608>restitution;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> he owns <S%H369>nothing,<s%> then he shall be <S%H4376>sold<s%> for his <S%H1591>theft.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> <S%H1591>what<s%> he <S%H1591>stole<s%> is <S%H4672>actually<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> in his <S%H3027>possession,<s%> <S%H4480>whether<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H5704>or<s%> a <S%H2543>donkey<s%> <S%H5704>or<s%> a <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> he shall <S%H9608>pay<s%> <S%H8147>double.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> lets a <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> be <S%H9059>grazed<s%> [bare] and <S%H7971>lets<s%> his <S%H1165>animal<s%> <S%H7971>loose<s%> so that it <S%H9059>grazes<s%> in <S%H312>another<s%> man's <S%H7704>field,<s%> he shall <S%H9608>make<s%> <S%H9608>restitution<s%> from the <S%H4315>best<s%> of his own <S%H7704>field<s%> and the <S%H4315>best<s%> of his own <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3318>breaks<s%> out and <S%H4672>spreads<s%> to <S%H6975>thorn<s%> <S%H6975>bushes,<s%> so that <S%H1430>stacked<s%> grain <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H7054>standing<s%> <S%H7054>grain<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> [itself] is <S%H398>consumed,<s%> he who <S%H1197>started<s%> the <S%H1200>fire<s%> shall <S%H9608>surely<s%> <S%H9608>make<s%> <S%H9608>restitution.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3627>goods<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> [for him,] and it is <S%H1589>stolen<s%> from the man's <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H1590>thief<s%> is <S%H4672>caught,<s%> he shall <S%H9608>pay<s%> <S%H8147>double.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> the <S%H1590>thief<s%> is not <S%H4672>caught,<s%> then the <S%H1167>owner<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H7126>appear<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> the <S%H430>judges,<s%> [to] determine <S%H518>whether<s%> <S%H3808><s%> he <S%H7971>laid<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> on his neighbor's <S%H4399>property.<s%>

"For <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6588>breach<s%> of <S%H6588>trust,<s%> [whether it is] for <S%H7794>ox,<s%> for <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> for <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> for <S%H8008>clothing,<s%> [or] for <S%H3605>any<s%> lost thing about <S%H9>which<s%> one <S%H9>says,<s%> <S%H834>'This<s%> is it,' the <S%H559>case<s%> of <S%H2088>both<s%> parties shall <S%H1697>come<s%> <S%H8147>before<s%> the <S%H935>judges;<s%> he <S%H5704>whom<s%> the <S%H430>judges<s%> <S%H834>condemn<s%> shall <S%H430>pay<s%> <S%H7561>double<s%> to his <S%H9608>neighbor.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> a <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> an <S%H7794>ox,<s%> a <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H929>animal<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> [for him,] and it <S%H4191>dies<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> is <S%H7665>hurt<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> is <S%H7617>driven<s%> <S%H7617>away<s%> while <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> is <S%H7200>looking,<s%>

an <S%H7621>oath<s%> before the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall be <S%H1961>made<s%> by the <S%H8147>two<s%> of them, that he has not <S%H7971>laid<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> on his neighbor's <S%H4399>property;<s%> and its <S%H1167>owner<s%> shall <S%H3947>accept<s%> [it,] and he shall not <S%H9608>make<s%> <S%H9608>restitution.<s%>
"But <S%H518>if<s%> it is <S%H1589>actually<s%> <S%H1589>stolen<s%> from him, he shall <S%H9608>make<s%> <S%H9608>restitution<s%> to its <S%H1167>owner.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> it is all <S%H2963>torn<s%> to <S%H2963>pieces,<s%> let him <S%H935>bring<s%> it as <S%H5707>evidence;<s%> he shall not <S%H9608>make<s%> <S%H9608>restitution<s%> for <S%H2966>what<s%> has been <S%H2966>torn<s%> to pieces.

"And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>borrows<s%> [anything] from his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and it is <S%H7665>injured<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4191>dies<s%> while its <S%H1167>owner<s%> is not with it, he shall <S%H9608>make<s%> <S%H9608>full<s%> <S%H9608>restitution.<s%>
<S%H518>"If<s%> its <S%H1167>owner<s%> is with it, he shall not <S%H9608>make<s%> <S%H9608>restitution;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> it is <S%H7916>hired,<s%> it <S%H935>came<s%> for its <S%H7939>hire.<s%>

"And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6601>seduces<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is not <S%H781>engaged,<s%> and <S%H7901>lies<s%> with her, he must <S%H4117>pay<s%> a <S%H4117>dowry<s%> for her [to be] his <S%H802>wife.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> her father <S%H1>absolutely<s%> <S%H3985>refuses<s%> to <S%H3985>give<s%> her to him, he shall <S%H5414>pay<s%> <S%H8254>money<s%> equal to the <S%H3701>dowry<s%> for <S%H4119>virgins.<s%>
"You shall not allow a <S%H3784>sorceress<s%> to <S%H2421>live.<s%>
<S%H3605>"Whoever<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> with an <S%H929>animal<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
"He who <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> to any <S%H430>god,<s%> <S%H1115>other<s%> <S%H1115>than<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H905>alone,<s%> shall be <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed.<s%>
"And you shall not <S%H3238>wrong<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> or <S%H3905>oppress<s%> him, for you were <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H490>widow<s%> or <S%H3490>orphan.<s%>
<S%H518>"If<s%> you <S%H6031>afflict<s%> him at <S%H6031>all,<s%> [and] <S%H518>if<s%> he does <S%H6817>cry<s%> out to Me, I will <S%H8085>surely<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> his <S%H6818>cry;<s%>

and My <S%H639>anger<s%> will be <S%H2734>kindled,<s%> and I will <S%H2026>kill<s%> you with the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and your <S%H802>wives<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H490>widows<s%> and your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H3490>fatherless.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> you <S%H9233>lend<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> to My <S%H5971>people,<s%> to the <S%H6041>poor<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> you, you are not to <S%H1961>act<s%> as a <S%H5383>creditor<s%> to him; you shall not <S%H7760>charge<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him <S%H5392>interest.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> you <S%H9111>ever<s%> <S%H9111>take<s%> your neighbor's <S%H8008>cloak<s%> as a <S%H9111>pledge,<s%> you are to <S%H7725>return<s%> it to him <S%H5704>before<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H935>sets,<s%>

for that is his <S%H905>only<s%> <S%H3682>covering;<s%> it is his <S%H8071>cloak<s%> for his <S%H5785>body.<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> else shall he <S%H7901>sleep<s%> in? And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about that <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H6817>cries<s%> out to Me, I will <S%H8085>hear<s%> [him,] for I am <S%H2587>gracious.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H7043>curse<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H779>curse<s%> a <S%H5387>ruler<s%> of your <S%H5971>people.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H309>delay<s%> [the offering from] your <S%H4395>harvest<s%> and your <S%H1831>vintage.<s%> The first-born of your <S%H1121>sons<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to Me.

"You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H3651>same<s%> with your <S%H7794>oxen<s%> [and] with your <S%H6629>sheep.<s%> It shall be with its <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it to Me.

"And you shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> to Me, therefore you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> [any] <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H2966>torn<s%> to pieces in the <S%H7704>field;<s%> you shall <S%H7993>throw<s%> it to the <S%H3611>dogs.<s%>
